name: Update Skeleton Documentation
description: Automatically updates SKELETON_OVERVIEW.md when skeleton-core changes

action.message:
A file in skeleton-core was modified. Please analyze the changes and update SKELETON_OVERVIEW.md with:

1. List all available components in skeleton-core/components
2. List all hooks in skeleton-core/hooks
3. List all utilities in skeleton-core/lib
4. List apps built on this skeleton (Haunted Tasks, Coven CRM)
5. Add a brief summary of recent changes

Keep it concise and well-formatted. Update the file at the root: SKELETON_OVERVIEW.md
